verses.verse: What <WG5101> then <WG3767> shall we say <WG2046> that Abraham <WG11>, our <WG2257> forefather <WG3962>, hath found <WG2147> according to <WG2596> the flesh <WG4561>?
For <WG1063> if <WG1487> Abraham <WG11> was justified <WG1344> by <WG1537> works <WG2041>, he hath <WG2192> whereof to glory <WG2745>; but <WG235> not <WG3756> toward <WG4314> God <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> what <WG5101> saith <WG3004> the scripture <WG1161>? And Abraham <WG11> believed <WG4100> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> it was reckoned <WG3049> unto him <WG846> for <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343>.
Now <WG1161> to him that worketh <WG2038>, the reward <WG3408> is <WG3049> not <WG3756> reckoned <WG3049> as of <WG2596> grace <WG5485>, but <WG235> as of <WG2596> debt <WG3783>.

But <WG1161> to him that worketh <WG2038> not <WG3361>, but <WG1161> believeth <WG4100> on <WG1909> him that justifieth <WG1344> the ungodly <WG765>, his <WG846> faith <WG4102> is reckoned <WG3049> for <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343>.

Even as <WG2509> David <WG1138> also <WG2532> pronounceth <WG3004> blessing <WG3108> upon the man <WG444>, unto whom <WG3739> God <WG2316> reckoneth <WG3049> righteousness <WG1343> apart <WG5565> from works <WG2041>,
saying <WG3107>, Blessed are they whose <WG3739> iniquities <WG458> are forgiven <WG863>, And <WG2532> whose <WG3739> sins <WG266> are covered <WG1943>.
Blessed <WG3107> is the man <WG435> to whom <WG3739>, the Lord <WG2962> will3049, 3756 not <WG3361> reckon <WG3049> sin <WG266>.

Is this <WG3778> blessing <WG3108> then <WG3767> pronounced upon <WG1909> the circumcision <WG4061>, or <WG2228> upon <WG1909> the uncircumcision <WG203> also <WG2532>? for <WG1063> we say <WG3004>, To Abraham11, 3754 his faith <WG4102> was reckoned <WG3049> for <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343>.

How <WG4459> then <WG3767> was it <WG3049> reckoned <WG3049>? when he was <WG5607> in <WG1722> circumcision <WG4061>, or <WG2228> in <WG1722> uncircumcision <WG203>? Not <WG3756> in <WG1722> circumcision <WG4061>, but <WG235> in <WG1722> uncircumcision <WG203>:

and <WG2532> he received <WG2983> the sign <WG4592> of circumcision <WG4061>, a seal <WG4973> of the righteousness <WG1343> of the faith <WG4102> which <WG1722> he had while he was in <WG1722> uncircumcision <WG203>; that <WG1519> he <WG846> might be <WG1511> the father <WG3962> of all <WG3956> them that believe <WG4100>, though they be <WG1223> in uncircumcision <WG203>, that <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343> might be reckoned <WG3049> unto <WG2532> them <WG846>;

and <WG2532> the father <WG3962> of circumcision <WG4061> to them who not <WG3756> only <WG3440> are <WG3588> of <WG1537> the circumcision <WG4061>, but <WG235> who <WG4748> also <WG2532> walk <WG4748> in the steps <WG2487> of <WG3962> that faith <WG4102> of <WG3962> our <WG2257> father <WG3962> Abraham <WG11> which <WG1722> he had in uncircumcision <WG203>.

For <WG1063> not <WG3756> through <WG1223> the law <WG3551> was the promise <WG1860> to Abraham <WG11> or <WG2228> to <WG4690> his <WG846> seed <WG4690> that he <WG846> should be <WG1511> heir <WG2818> of the world <WG2889>, but <WG235> through <WG1223> the righteousness <WG1343> of faith <WG4102>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1487> they that are <WG3588> of <WG1537> the law <WG3551> are heirs <WG2818>, faith <WG4102> is made void <WG2758>, and <WG2532> the promise <WG1860> is made of none effect <WG2673>:
for <WG1063> the law <WG3551> worketh <WG2716> wrath <WG3709>; but <WG1063> where <WG3757> there is <WG2076> no <WG3756> law <WG3551>, neither <WG3761> is there transgression <WG3847>.

For <WG1223> this <WG5124> cause it is of <WG1537> faith <WG4102>, that <WG2443> it may be according <WG2596> to grace <WG5485>; to the end <WG1519> that the promise <WG1860> may be <WG1511> sure <WG949> to all <WG3956> the seed <WG4690>; not <WG3756> to that <WG3588> only <WG3440> which is of <WG1537> the law <WG3551>, but <WG235> to that <WG3588> also <WG2532> which is of <WG1537> the faith <WG4102> of Abraham <WG11>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> the father <WG3962> of us <WG2257> all <WG3956>

<WG3754> (as <WG2531> it is written <WG1125>, A father <WG3962> of many <WG4183> nations <WG1484> have I made <WG5087> thee <WG4571>) before <WG2713> him whom <WG3739> he believed <WG4100>, even God <WG2316>, who giveth life <WG2227> to the dead <WG3498>, and <WG2532> calleth <WG2564> the things that are <WG5607> not <WG3361>, as <WG5613> though they were <WG5607>.

Who <WG3739> in <WG1909> hope <WG1680> believed <WG4100> against <WG3844> hope <WG1680>, to the end that <WG1519> he <WG846> might become <WG1096> a father <WG3962> of many <WG4183> nations <WG1484>, according to <WG2596> that which had been spoken <WG2046>, So <WG3779> shall <WG2071> thy <WG4675> seed <WG4690> be <WG2071>.

And <WG2532> without <WG3361> being <WG770> weakened <WG770> in faith <WG4102> he considered2657, 3756 his own <WG1438> body <WG4983> now <WG2235> as good as dead <WG3499> (he being about <WG4225> a hundred years old <WG1541>), and <WG2532> the deadness <WG3500> of <WG3388> Sarah <WG4564>'s womb <WG5225>;

yet <WG1519>, looking unto the promise <WG1860> of God <WG2316>, he wavered <WG1252> not <WG3756> through unbelief <WG570>, but <WG235> waxed strong <WG1743> through faith <WG4102>, giving <WG1325> glory <WG1391> to God <WG2316>,
and <WG2532> being fully assured <WG4135> that <WG3754> what <WG3739> he had promised <WG1861>, he was <WG2076> able <WG1415> also <WG2532> to perform <WG4160>.
<WG2532> Wherefore <WG1352> also it was reckoned <WG3049> unto him <WG846> for <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343>.
Now <WG1161> it was <WG1125> not <WG3756> written <WG1125> for <WG1223> his <WG846> sake <WG1223> alone <WG3440>, that <WG3754> it was reckoned <WG3049> unto him <WG846>;

but <WG235> for <WG1223> our sake <WG2248> also <WG2532>, unto whom <WG3739> it shall <WG3195> be reckoned <WG3049>, who <WG3588> believe <WG4100> on <WG1909> him that raised <WG1453> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>,
who <WG3739> was delivered <WG3860> up for <WG1223> our <WG2257> trespasses <WG3900>, and <WG2532> was raised <WG1453> for <WG1223> our <WG2257> justification <WG1347>.
